inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/checkout/v3/auth/payment-requests/[^/]+" and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/checkout/v3/auth/payment-requests/[^/]+" and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "ecommerce/checkout/v3/auth/payment-requests/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| extend HTTPStatus = case(
  httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  httpStatus_d between (400 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

content.Query:
let api_url = "ecommerce/checkout/v3/auth/payment-requests/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| extend HTTPStatus = case(
  httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  httpStatus_d == 401, "401",
  httpStatus_d between (400 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 3;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/checkout/v3/auth/payment-requests/[^/]+" and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| summarize
    watermark=threshold,
    duration_percentile_95=percentiles(timeTaken_d, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "response time(s)")
